## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                 | Description                                      |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| `--background-color` | Defines the menu background color                |
| `--foreground-color` | A color that contrasts with the background color |
| `--text-color`       | The color of the text                            |
